description: A chronic condition that affects how your body turns food into energy. It causes high blood sugar and may require insulin therapy.
A neurological condition characterized by intense headaches, nausea, and sensitivity to light. It may be triggered by stress or certain foods.
A lung infection caused by bacteria or viruses, leading to symptoms like cough, fever, and difficulty breathing.
A chronic inflammatory disease of the airways that causes wheezing, breathlessness, and chest tightness.
A condition in which the blood pressure in the arteries is persistently elevated. It increases risk of heart disease and stroke.
